Text: 2 pices chicken with chips @390 TERRIBLE. the tortilla chips were not properly cooked and were inly about 9 pathetic pices. Sgameful.

Reviewed April 30, 2022 via mobile Poor service. PATHETIC Today I ordered the following as attached on the receipt via the drive thru at Lavington. After paying when we collected the food. I checked and one soda and coleslaw was missing , after inquiring with them they refused to give us the soda and...coleslaw. We just had to leave. I recommend all to check their take away as you too maybe conned as I was.More >Date of visit: April 2022Helpful?This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews.

Reviewed November 9, 2021 via mobile UnbelievableHow is KFC Kenya still in business,food almost like boiled not fried,service is pathetic ,staff are not trained and cannot handle clients,the place in lavington was flooded with leaking water,food took an hour to come,stomach upsets are a norm from KFC,I've had KFC all over...the world,but in Kenya it's a truly unique and pathetic experience.MoreDate of visit: November 2021Helpful?1  This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Reviewed February 7, 2020 Horrible food and serviceTLDR; their food causes stomach upsets, the service at Junction is terrible and the portions are worse. I've been ordering from these guys for sometime. Over the last few times every time I ordered from their Hurligham branch, I always end up with a stomach...ache the next day. So I decided to order from Junction, the first time went OK, no stomach aches the portions were OK. Yesterday, I ordered from the Junction again, the food was cold- no freezing, the portions were not worth it and now everybody who had the food has a stomach ache.More >Date of visit: February 2020Helpful?1  This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Reviewed October 31, 2018 KFC in KenyaThey had new items on the menu which we bough in a hurry on our way to the airport. Cant really go wrong with KFC. 
The service was quick and polite and the restaurant seemed clean.

web-scraper-score: The food we got was tasty and lived up...to KFC expectations.
